message: Let's each put in 10. We’ll all benefit more from the bigger pot. If anyone free-rides, I’ll punish them.
Let's all contribute fairly to the public fund and avoid unnecessary punishment! Cooperation is key.
Let's cooperate to maximize our earnings, contribute fairly, and avoid unnecessary punishments.

Hi everyone! Let's maximize our collective gains. I suggest we all contribute our full $20 this round. This creates the most value for everyone. I'll be watching contributions and may punish free-riders. Cooperation benefits us all!
Let's all contribute generously! Cooperation benefits everyone.

I see P5 is the worst free-rider but still wealthy. P3 only contributed half yet has the most. Let's all contribute our FULL amounts - I'll contribute fully again and will punish anyone contributing less than 100%.
Let's contribute fairly again, aiming for a balance between personal gain and collective benefit to maximize our earnings.
I’m sorry for free-riding. Let’s each put in 10 this round; I’ll do so. No need for punishments if we cooperate.
Let's aim for a more balanced contribution this round. I contributed a fair amount last time and hope others will do the same. Let's keep the punishments minimal and focus on growing the fund.
Let's keep contributing fairly! Everyone benefits when we cooperate.

I'm now in last place after being heavily punished. I'll still cooperate with a fair contribution. Could we agree on everyone contributing at least $10? Let's focus on growing the fund rather than punishing each other. Cooperation benefits us all!
Let's keep contributing fairly! Cooperation benefits everyone.
Let's focus on cooperation and fair contributions to maximize our earnings, avoiding unnecessary punishments and promoting a positive environment.
Let’s continue cooperating. I’ll contribute 10 again if others do as well. No punishments needed if we all share fairly and focus on maximizing the pot.

Let's try to contribute proportionally to our balances this round. I contributed a fair amount in the past and was punished for it. I hope for more cooperation and less unnecessary punishment this round.
Let's maintain cooperation and fair contributions to maximize earnings, aiming for $10 each to ensure everyone benefits and minimize punishments.
Let’s each contribute 10 if possible. Those with less can contribute what they can. No punishments needed if we cooperate. We’ll keep growing the pot!

I'm broke due to punishment cycles while others prosper. I'll contribute fairly from my limited funds. Let's agree on proportional contributions (~50% of balances) not fixed amounts. P3/P4/P5 are wealthy but contributing proportionally less. Cooperation over revenge benefits all.
Let's keep contributing fairly! Cooperation benefits everyone.

Given my low balance and the history of punishment, I'll suggest a smaller contribution. Let's all contribute $5 this round to rebuild the fund and avoid further punishment. Cooperation is key to recovery!
Let's keep contributing fairly! Cooperation benefits everyone.
Let's maintain cooperation with proportional contributions, aiming for 50% of our balances to maximize earnings and minimize punishments.
Let’s keep cooperating to grow the pot. Contribute at least 10 or as much as you comfortably can. I won't punish if we see fair effort, so let’s keep the game profitable for all.

I'm at the bottom due to punishment cycles that only benefited others. I'll still contribute proportionally (40% of my balance). P2 and P3 keep targeting me while P4/P5 prosper. If we want a fair game, consider proportional contributions and stop punishing those with less.

Given my balance and the previous rounds, I'll contribute $8. Let's aim for proportional contributions to rebuild the fund and avoid further cycles of punishment. Cooperation is key for long-term gains!
Let's continue contributing fairly! Cooperation benefits everyone. Aim for at least 50% of your balance to keep the fund growing. Avoid unnecessary punishment cycles so we all profit.
Let's maintain cooperation with proportional contributions to maximize earnings and minimize punishments, aiming for 50% of our balances.

Let's end the costly punishment cycles. I’ll contribute fairly again. If we cooperate and keep punishments minimal, we all profit more. Let’s each put in at least $10 and avoid targeting each other, focusing on maximizing our final payouts.
Given my balance and the game's history, I'll contribute $7. Let's aim for proportional contributions to rebuild the fund and avoid further punishment cycles. Cooperation is key for long-term gains!

I'll contribute 50% of my balance. Notice P4 has pulled ahead while we're caught in punishment cycles. Let's focus on proportional contributions (40-50% of balances) and stop punishing the poorest players. True cooperation means relative fairness, not fixed amounts.
Let's aim for proportional contributions again, around 30-40% of our balances. I'll contribute accordingly. Hopefully, we can avoid unnecessary punishments and focus on growing the fund together.
Let's focus on cooperation and proportional contributions, aiming for 50% of our balances to maximize earnings and minimize punishments.

Let’s each aim for around 50% contributions and keep punishments minimal. By cooperating, we grow the pot and avoid draining each other’s balances. We all profit more from building our funds than from punishing.
Let's keep contributing fairly! Cooperation benefits everyone. Aim for at least 50% of your balance to keep the fund growing. Avoid unnecessary punishment cycles so we all profit.

P4 has almost DOUBLE my balance while we waste money punishing each other. I'll contribute 50% of my low balance. Please consider proportional contributions instead of punishing the poorest player. Let's stop the revenge cycle and cooperate to catch up to P4.
Let's maintain cooperation with proportional contributions, aiming for 50% of our balances to maximize earnings and minimize punishments.

P4 has TRIPLED my balance while we destroy each other with punishments. I'll contribute 50% of my small balance. Please stop punishing the poorest player - it's just helping P4 win. Let's cooperate these final rounds to have a chance.
Let's keep contributing fairly! Cooperation benefits everyone. Aim for at least 50% of your balance to keep the fund growing. Avoid unnecessary punishment cycles so we all profit.
Given my balance, I'll contribute $5. Let's all try to contribute proportionally and avoid unnecessary punishments. Cooperation is key to maximizing our final payouts.

We should each contribute proportionally, especially those with higher balances. P4, your lead is big—please contribute fairly so we can all catch up. If everyone cooperates, we can grow the pot. I'll put in 10. Let's end punishment cycles and prioritize mutual gain.
Let's aim for 40% contributions. I'll contribute $9. We need to cooperate to catch up to P4. Let's end these punishment cycles and focus on growing the fund one last time!
Let's cooperate for the final rounds, aiming for proportional contributions to maximize earnings and minimize punishments, ensuring a fair end to the game.
Let's keep contributing fairly! Cooperation benefits everyone. Aim for at least 50% of your balance to keep the fund growing. Avoid unnecessary punishment cycles so we all profit.

We have just 2 rounds left. I'm in last place due to punishment cycles. Let's all contribute fairly (~50% of balance) and stop punishing each other. P4 just lost their lead—cooperation now benefits everyone. No more revenge!

Let’s maximize contributions to grow the final pot and avoid punishment. If we each give ~50% again, we all profit more than if we fight. P2, you lead; show fair contribution so no one needs to punish. Let’s finish strong together.
Contribute fairly for the final round, aiming for 50% of our balances to maximize the pot and ensure a fair finish.

Let's end on a fair note! Contribute at least 50% of your balance so we all benefit. Avoid unnecessary punishments—cooperation now helps everyone maximize their final standing. Let’s finish strong together!

Final round! I'll contribute 50% of my balance. Let's all give generously one last time to maximize returns. P4/P5 have big leads - if we waste money on punishment now, they win. Let's cooperate to close gaps rather than ensure others lose.
Let's all contribute around 50% for one last boost! No punishments this round. Let's see who can end with the most through cooperation!

Let’s each contribute fairly one last time—around half our balances—to grow everyone’s final share. P4, please lead by contributing at least 10. If any free-ride, we should punish accordingly. Cooperation benefits everyone now.
